item.title: About
item.description: My name is Tonio Liebrand. I graduated with a M.Sc. in Finance. Prior to working as a data scientist in Frankfurt I gained ~2 years of experience as a consultant. I am also the co-founder and silent partner of a statistical consultancy (statistik-beratung.com). Why data science? In short it is the usage of my statistical toolbox to generate value from “raw” numbers and text. An example i like to tell in interviews, is described here.
